t: In A Survey, Amazon Stands Out As Minnesota's Most Trusted Retail Brand

t: Woodbury lands Amazon distribution center – Twin Cities
s: October 12, 2021 - HOURS: Monday – Friday 8:00AM – 5:00PM (CLOSED WEEKENDS and HOLIDAYS) Please submit your memoriam ad to memoriams@pioneerpress.com or call 651-228-5280. ... Amazon is coming to Woodbury – with a trucking and warehousing building the size of 11 football fields.

t: Amazon distribution center coming to Woodbury - Bring Me The News
s: October 13, 2021 - The Pioneer Press confirmed this week the project, referred to in city documents as Project Belle, is an Amazon distribution center that will see 140 trucks entering and leaving the site every day.  · Woodbury City Planner Eric Searles told Bring Me The News on Wednesday it is "our understanding ...

t: Photos: Take a look inside Amazon's new Woodbury facility
s: March 6, 2023 - Many of 300 the employees at the Amazon Sort Center in Woodbury are of Somali descent, so the 520,000-square-foot facility -- the first Amazon facility located in the east metro -- includes signs in Somali, seen Tuesday, Sept. 27, 2022. Translation services also are provided.
